Html:
Hello,

Does anyone know any setting that allow all received messages to be automatically save as file ?

Many Thanks.

Regards Dat.

I've notice that the AutoViewMessage is saved as eml is it possible to amend this to save as msg so that it open in outlook ?

Thanks.

See this link for details of setting up outlook to open .eml files:
http://www.msoutlook.info/question/354
